plot: A mysterious young woman has been horribly attacked by a powerful and elusive enemy. Detective Paul F. Gimbal decides to protect her and starts a dark investigation to overcome the dangerous thief who wants to destroy everything.
title: El ladrón de caras
plot_es: A mysterious young woman has been horribly attacked by a powerful and elusive enemy. Detective Paul F. Gimbal decides to protect her and starts a dark investigation to overcome the dangerous thief who wants to destroy everything.
